statements.statement: STRA gives me work that can fit in around caring responsibilities
STRA has allowed me to start a business
There are more opportunities to keep an eye on the property if it is rented as STRA
Tenants in long term rental have greater rights/powers over my property than in STRA
STRA helps to cover the costs of owning/renting the home that I live in (e.g. mortgage, rent, renovations)
STRA helps me to afford the rising cost of living
STRA helps with the ongoing costs of having an investment property (e.g. mortgage, rates, maintenance, renovations)
Income from STRA has peaks and troughs
STRA is less profitable when more people are doing it
It is difficult to get reimbursed if STRA guests cause damage
STRA makes more money than long term rentals
STRA is a way to meet new people
STRA has become more professional and less friendly
I enjoy making STRA guests happy
STRA gives me flexibility to use my property when and how I want to
STRA means that I can use the property in future if my needs change
Before STRA, my property was not fully utilised (e.g. holiday house)
My STRA property is convenient for my job sometimes
There is a lot of administration in running an STRA property
The work required to keep an STRA property clean and appealing can be unpleasant
Managing an STRA is hard work
Guests expect STRA properties to be as professional as hotels these days
Managing reviews can be stressful
STRA is a way to learn about other cultures
STRA is a way to share my culture with others
STRA allows me to give others the same opportunities I have had when travelling
STRA platforms provide hosts with positive feedback
Taxes drive up the price of owning an investment property
There are more costs with STRA than with long term rental
STRA causes more wear and tear than long term rentals
Online payments for STRA are a risk for property owners
Hosting people with different political backgrounds can be a challenge for STRA owners
Putting a property onto STRA means that it is no longer a private space
I have worried about my safety around STRA guests
STRA guests can cause problems by staying past check out time
The public perception is that all STRA owners are rich
